#summary Internal representation of fuzzy objects
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

The internal representation of NulFuzzyObj are a !JavaScript object whose heritage is JsNulKlg and contains a reference to an value.

== properties ==

|| value || JsNulObj || The representation of the object ||

== methods ==

|| unify || function(JsNulFuzzyObj) || Creates a new fuzzy object that is a version of this one who can unify to the given one ||
|| unify || function(JsNulObj) || Creates a new fuzzy object containing weither the fixed value given as parameter, either a failure fuzzy object ||
